settings.paragraph: Don’t see what you’re looking for but still want to get involved? Get in touch at workwithus@oseamalibu.com.

settings.container_classes: flex md:justify-center items-center tracking-wide font-book bg-seafoam-200 overflow-x-auto

settings.paragraph_text: At OSEA Malibu, every decision we make comes from a commitment to treat our skin, ourselves and our planet with kindness. OSEA Skincare was inspired off the coast of Malibu uniting the elements—Ocean, Sun, Earth and Atmosphere—to deliver safe, effective wellness solutions for all. We seek to prioritize using naturally derived ingredients in all our formulations. A potent blend of seaweed combined with active botanicals deliver nutrients to the skin. Founded in 1996, we’ve set the standard for clean beauty for over 27 years.

settings.heading: Levity & Perspective
settings.paragraph: We understand that it’s important to see the bigger picture, but to also have a sense of humor. At the end of the day, it’s just skincare!

settings.heading: Service Excellence
settings.paragraph: Our team values going above and beyond through active listening and being responsive.

settings.heading: Honesty & Integrity
settings.paragraph: We know that it’s ok to say “I don’t know”. It’s important to take responsibility and respect confidentiality.

settings.heading: Growth & Continuous Learning
settings.paragraph: We strive to seek feedback, embrace challenges, and share knowledge.

settings.heading: Resourcefulness
settings.paragraph: We enjoy thinking outside of the box! We’re a team that adapts to changes, maximizes our resources, and learns from experiences.

settings.heading: Kindness
settings.paragraph: We spread kindness towards ourselves, each other and the planet.

settings.heading: Commitment
settings.paragraph: We believe in being reliable, taking ownership, and innovating. We commit to doing our best individually, as a team, and as a company.

settings.heading: Teamwork & Collaboration
settings.paragraph: We support each other by having shared goals, asking for help, and celebrating our successes.

settings.container_classes: container lg:max-w-screen-lg grid grid-cols-4 gap-2 sm:gap-4

settings.heading: Working at OSEA
settings.paragraph: We foster a culture of kindness, driven by a creative, passionate, high-performing team. We prioritize collective wellbeing and embrace the unique backgrounds, talents and skill sets that each of our team members bring. We respect our community, our planet and each other. Together we work to create exceptional products and inspire positive change every day.

settings.heading: Wellbeing Stipend
settings.paragraph: Quarterly wellbeing stipend to support a comfortable and productive home office environment.

settings.heading: Planning for Retirement
settings.paragraph: Save for your future with a 401(k) plus a company contribution.

settings.heading: Paid Time Off
settings.paragraph: Generous PTO & paid company holidays.

settings.heading: Health Benefits
settings.paragraph: 100% employer paid medical insurance + generous contribution to dental & vision.

settings.heading: OSEA Products
settings.paragraph: Quarterly credit so you can stock up on your favorite products.

settings.heading: In Person Connection
settings.paragraph: Annual team retreat so you can get to know your colleagues IRL!

settings.container_classes: container lg:max-w-screen-lg grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-2 sm:gap-4

settings.content: Our interview process typically consists of four interview rounds. First, there's an initial 30-minute phone call with our People Team to gauge your interest in the role, discuss your past experience, and answer your questions. Second, you'll have an interview with the hiring manager who will delve deeper into your background and assess your potential contributions to our company within the specific function of the role you're applying for. Third, a team interview will introduce you to a peer or cross-functional partner as collaboration is central to every project at OSEA. Lastly, you'll meet with a senior leader for a final interview. Depending on the role, we may ask you to complete a short assessment after the initial phone screen.

settings.summary: What does OSEA look for in a candidate?
settings.content: We're on the lookout for candidates who possess the right skills, experience, and who are excited about our brand mission. At OSEA we're all about fostering an entrepreneurial spirit and creating a professional yet kind environment that encourages our team to bring their authentic selves to work. We deeply appreciate the values of service excellence, teamwork, and continuous growth and learning. If you're someone who's truly passionate about doing their best work, loves collaborating on projects that make a difference, and having fun along the way, we’d love to meet you.

settings.summary: I’m having trouble submitting my application, what should I do?
settings.content: If you are experiencing trouble completing an online application via our Careers page, please feel free to send an email to peopleops@oseamalibu.com. A member of our People Operations team will be in touch to assist.
